name: The box (itch) (bigasdev)
description:
You are a box and is your duty to be tested all day! Dr. Boxestein just built a powerful tube for you.. How high can you set the fall record? 

Simple controls!

WASD or arrow keys - Movement

E - Interaction

Remember you can hold "E" on the tube to have a powerful launch

Credits

I created the game alone in 48hours.

Used Aseprite for the art,

Unity Engine and vscode for the game and programming and

Sfxr for the sounds.
